{"id":1260667212,"question_id":125,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1715963265,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"9 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1260667212/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool valid (char ch){\n        return isalnum(ch);\n    }\n    char tolcase(char ch){\n         if ((ch>='a'&& ch<='z')|| (ch>='0'&&ch<='9')){\n            return ch;\n         }\n         else{\n            return tolower(ch);\n        }\n    }\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        string temp = \"\";\n        for(int i=0; i<s.size();i++){\n            if (valid(s[i])) temp.push_back(tolcase(s[i]));\n        \n        }\n        int start=0;\n        int end= temp.size()-1;\n        while(start<=end){\n            if ((temp[start])!=temp[end]) return false;\n            else{\n                start++;\n                end--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
